description: Protect your 11 inch Apple MacBook Air with this Tidal Sleeve Case from CaseCrown! Your MacBook Air deserves to be snug and secure with this case. One of the most unique features of this case is the wavy quilted design that reflects the shape and form of tidal waves. That is where the case gets its name! The interior of the case is smooth and soft with fleece lining on top of the already padded case to protect your MacBook Air from any damages, and the material will prevent scratches while you are carrying it around in the case. The envelope style case has a top opening for your MacBook Air, which makes it easy for you to slip in or remove your device. Because of its slim design, this case offers convenient mobility so you can just grab your MacBook Air and be ready to go knowing it will be protected at all times.
title: CaseCrown Tidal Sleeve Case (Purple) for 11 Inch Apple MacBook Air
